thread.title: Chris Goodison

author: Chris Goodison
title: Chris Goodison
text:
The fitter rang me before he arrived confirming the time. He then then arrived bang on time. I gave him the wheel locking nut and didn't here another thing until 40mins later he knocked on the door letting me know the job was done (2no new tyres to a Volvo XC90).
This is a very convenient service and I can't see myself going and sitting at a tyre fitting garage again.
